DOC.brief_summary: In this project, intensive care unit (ICU) patients treated with beta-lactam antibiotics are included with the aim to investigate the potential underdosing in this patient group. Four regional ICU-clinics are recruiting consecutive patients (n=120) and samples are taken before the next dose is administered for three consecutive days.
DOC.brief_title: The Distribution of Plasma Drug Concentrations of Beta-lactam Antibiotics in Intensive Care Unit Patients
DOC.criteria: Current treatment with betalactam antibiotics and admission to the ICU Pregnancy, age below 18 years
